lexUnit.name: punish.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: inflict a penalty on someone for an offence

sentence.text: Yet this is how crying in infants is sometimes interpreted : the child is being naughty ; naughtiness is punished ; smacking is how I was punished as a child ; so I smack my baby .
